title: Just got permabanned?
body:
So I was really confused why I was permabanned and I checked paypal and it says +5 from riot games today... The stores disabled and I 100% know I haven't made a charge back, what's going on?
Checked: Due to the severity of this violation, your League of Legends account has been banned until Mon Feb 22 22:22:22 UTC 2100

replies.body: Yes cuz this is definitely the year 2100.

Year 2100 is geberally code for a chargeback issue or something like that.

It is a soft ban until you contact support with a ticket to find out what is wrong.

You can leave a support ticket here..

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
